pullrequest.title: update to raw, meshes, and bdi_parser

content.raw: John-  Here is another attempt at that commit.  I redid everything from a mercurial point-of-view to make the commit look cleaner.  Took me a while to figure out how to fork things properly, but I think I have it right now. -Bill
